com.google.appengine.tools.mapreduce.impl.shardedjob

Interface IncrementalTask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IncrementalTaskWithContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapOnlyShardTask, MapShardTask, MergeShardTask, ReduceShardTask, SortShardTask, WorkerShardTask

    public interface IncrementalTask
extends Serializable
    Portion of a sharded job that will be run in a single task queue task.
    Author:
    ohler@google.com (Christian Ohler)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowSliceRetry(boolean abandon) 
      void cleanup()
      Clean up and release any resources claimed in prepare.
      boolean isDone() 
      void jobCompleted(Status status)
      A job completed callback to allow resource cleanup and compaction of the finalized state.
      void prepare()
      Called immediately before run.
      void run()
      Runs this task.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        void prepare()
        Called immediately before run. This method should be very limited in scope and should not block, perform IO or fail for any reason other than Rejecting the request.
        Throws:
        RejectRequestException - when run cannot be called at this time.

      • run

        void run()
        Runs this task. This will be invoked over and over until isDone returns true. If this throws an exception, it may be retried a limited number of times according to a retry policy specified in ShardedJobSettings
        Throws:
        ShardFailureException - when shard should be retried
        RuntimeException - when a slice should be retried

      • cleanup

        void cleanup()
        Clean up and release any resources claimed in prepare. Implementations of this method should not throw under any circumstances.

      • isDone

        boolean isDone()
        Returns:
        true iff this task is done and run should no longer be invoked.

      • allowSliceRetry

        boolean allowSliceRetry(boolean abandon)
        Parameters:
        abandon - true if a retry is due to an abandoned lock.
        Returns:
        true if a slice retry after failure are permitted.

      • jobCompleted

        void jobCompleted(Status status)
        A job completed callback to allow resource cleanup and compaction of the finalized state.
        Parameters:
        status - the status of the job
